text: Groede () is a village in the Dutch province of Zeeland. It is located about 5 km north of Oostburg in the municipality of Sluis. Groede was a separate municipality until 1970.Ad van der Meer and Onno Boonstra, "Repertorium van Nederlandse gemeenten", KNAW, 2006. == Gallery == Image:Groede, kerk foto4 2011-08-21 11.04.JPG|Groede, church: de Grote Kerk Image:Groede, Rooms Katholiek kerk foto5 2011-08-21 11.31.JPG|Groede, catholic church Image:Groede, monumentaal pand aan de Markt 2 RM31517 foto3 2011-08-21 11.20.jpg|Groede, monumental houses ==References== ==External links== * * Map of the former municipality in 1868.
